name: Processing Font File
summary: Learn about .VLW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Processing can read VLW files using the loadFont() command.

description: A VLW file is a font format used by the images and animations making software, Processing. It stores vector fonts in a compact way that can be scaled to any size without losing quality. This makes its use in graphics and visual design. Processing provides the capability to make images and animations, where these VLW font glyphs are used.

Font file created by Processing, a program used for making images and animations; saves a collection of glyphs that were converted from another system font (Tools â†’ Create Font in Processing); can be inserted into sketches and animations.
